1.14.4.1.0.0:
Required forge version: 1.14.4-28.2.3
First release for 1.14.4

[R] Config for removing unwanted post types. (No point doing it)

1.12.2.0.1.5:
Required forge version: 1.12.2-14.23.5.2820

[A] Config for removing unwanted posts types. [Use with Caution]
1.12.2.0.1.4:
- New Formatting -
[A] = Added.
[F] = Fixed.
[C] = Changed.
[R] = Removed.
==================

[A] 2-Wide Arm for Posts.
[A] Chinese Translation. (scikirbypoke)
[C] Semantic Corrections in Russian Translation. (Shellyoung)
[C] PostBase Recipe. Now using Cobblestone instead of Cobblestone-Walls.
[C] Manual Entries. Being more readable and adding some nice images aswell.
[F] Collision for Mini-Arms won't cause trouble anymore.
1.12.2.0.1.3:
Change of plan.
Warning: Please backup your world!

- Added -
  Concrete and Leaded Concrete Post.
  Ways to localize things.
  Russian Localization. (Shellyoung)

- Fixes -
  Post directly above the Postbase thinking its also a postbase.
  Possible typos.

- Changes -
  Removed old Rod items and Re-added them using Metadata.
  Index-Page is now twice as indexy.

I may have forgotten some things, been a while.
Use up all the rods you crafted (if any) or destroy/recycle them befor updating. Because they'll be gone and replaced by the new ones!
Sorry for being so chaotic with this. I should've done this at the start.
1.12.2.0.1.2:
- Changes -
  Optimized BlockStates to only include things that actualy matter.

- Fixes -
  Arms always facing down after reloading world.


- Important notice befor updating, please read! -
This update, provided i didnt mess up again, will be the last one with the items having each a different ID!

After this the items will only use one ID instead. So whenever that update comes, either use up all the rods
you crafted or destroy/recycle them befor updating. Because they'll be gone! (And backup your world, just incase)
And re-apear with another ID. (Using metadata this time)

I'll update to it just befor i move over to 1.13 (Once IE has it's first release for that.)

If you read all this, thank you for your time. I hereby release you from this mess. :D
1.12.2.0.1.1:
- Changes -
  Increased explosion resistance to 5.
  IE-Manual Entries a little bit.
  Increased contrast for almost all post textures.
  Copper-post texture to give it the patina look.
  Mini-arms now appear on the top most post block.
  Mini-arms are now included into the selection boundry.
  Clamped selection bounds for arms.

- Fixes -
  Fences connecting to posts and base.

At some point i'll make it so that fences and rod items only take up one block/item id. So far every fence uses it's own Block ID, same with Rods which is a waste of space.
And to keep you guys from going insane with the updates, i'll leave it like this for now. Until then have fun!
1.12.2.0.1.0:
This is a rather big one, with lots of new stuff being added.
I highly recommend making a backup of your world befor loading it with this update!

- Additions -
10 new posts and matching fences (and rods to craft said fences) to use for extending. (See list below.)

- Changes -
"improved" pages for the IE Manual Category.
Added recipes for the fences mentioned above in the manual aswell.



- List of post types. -
  Constantan
  Copper
  Electrum
  Gold
  Iron
  Lead
  Nickel
  Silver
  Uranium
  and Nether-Brick (Because why not)
1.12.2.0.0.5:
- Changes -
Post "mini-arms" now behave like the ones from IE.
  As you'd expect them to.
Being a perfectionist with textures.
  Aka got rid of what apeared to be Stretching when looking at the top-most blocks.
Some more opimization, mostly with the way "connections" are checked for the arms.
  It's now X amount of times faster. Yes, im not sure by how much.
  But i definitely noticed less lag when placing blocks near posts. (I have a potato, so i notice that stuff fairly easily)
1.12.2.0.0.4-01:
- Additions -
IE Manual Entry

- Changes -
Generaly optimizing a few things here and there.

- Fixes -
Tooltip now displays correctly.
Mini-Arms now don't apear anymore when a multiblock structure from IE is next to it.
Missing texture on the bottom side of the top post cap.
Creative Tab now has the correct name.
1.12.2.0.0.4:
Finaly added these mini-arm that apear on the posts themself. (When you attach for example a lever to them)

So now it's (technicaly) feature-complete.
1.12.2.0.0.3:
- Changes -
Made arms less.. fiddly. (I hope)

- Fixes -
Item model is finaly visible to the world!

I know: Just for that?
Why?
I planned to add something else too but it will take longer than i first thought.
1.12.2.0.0.2:
- Additions -
Setup update notification stuff. (Now whenever a new version is released you'll be notified in-game.)
Added recipe for the Extendable Post prematurely. (Mind that the item still doesnt display correctly!)

- Changes -
Changed versioning scheme to fit the update notfication stuff. (Starting with 0.0.2)

- Fixes -
Right-clicking an arm with a fence, and another arm being directly above it, won't spawn a post ontop of the second arm.
Right-clicking an upside-down arm with a fence won't place a post above it.
1.12.2.0.0.1.001:
- Fixes - 
Arms now correctly display upside down when a block is below it.
Arms don't flip if a block is already above it.
Post Top doesnt change to normal Post when an Arm is above it.

Now requires ImmersiveEngineering 0.12 or Higher. (Instead of ImmersiveEngineering 0.12-8)
